responsibilities: Create visibility of Arize and Phoenix content through daily technical content shared on platforms like Twitter, LinkedIn, and Reddit.
Build connections to Arize and Phoenix through viewership and consumption of AI-related materials.
Develop research, content, and video snippets that resonate in the AI community and relate to Arize in areas of Evaluation, AI Assistants, AI Agents, and AI Applications.
Write code, build AI applications, and create cookbooks that demonstrate Arize product lines or other ecosystem tools for the AI community.
Write a guide on AI social marketing to convert AI content consumption into OSS product usage and awareness.
qualifications: Working knowledge of generative AI, machine learning, and data science.
Technical experience with the LLM app development stack, including agents, orchestration frameworks, vector databases, and evaluation libraries.
Excellent written and verbal communication skills.
Ability to engage in technical communities via platforms like GitHub, Medium, DZone, Stack Overflow, Reddit, and LinkedIn.
Data-driven creativity and ability to ideate and deliver novel activities.
Self-learning ability and comfort with technical complexity.
analysis:
The job responsibilities include developing content and applications related to AI, specifically mentioning areas such as AI Assistants, AI Agents, and AI Applications. These areas often involve the use of Generative AI and language models. Additionally, the responsibilities include writing code and building AI applications, which suggests a technical role that likely involves working with AI technologies.

The skills required for the job further support the involvement with Generative AI and language models. The job explicitly mentions a "working knowledge of generative AI" and "technical experience with the LLM app development stack," which includes agents, orchestration frameworks, vector databases, and evaluation libraries. These are all components commonly associated with the development and deployment of language models and Generative AI systems.

Overall, both the responsibilities and skills indicate that the job involves working with Generative AI and language models.
